description.english: Take a look at the tutorial.
description.german: Wirf einen Blick auf das Tutorial.
description.french: Jetez un œil au tutoriel.
description.schinese: 查阅教程。
description.russian: Просмотреть учебник.
description.brazilian: Confira o tutorial.

description.english: Buy every type of clothing in a single game.
description.german: Kaufe jede Art von Kleidung in einem einzigen Spiel.
description.french: Achetez chaque type de vêtement en une seule partie.
description.schinese: 在每一局游戏中购买每种类型的服装。
description.russian: Купить одежду всех видов за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Compre todos os tipos de roupa em uma única partida.

displayName.french: Remettre le nudisme au goût du jour
displayName.brazilian: Igual ao dia em que eu nasci

description.english: Win a game butt naked.
description.french: Gagnez une partie à poil.
description.schinese: 赤身裸体通关一局游戏。
description.russian: Выиграть игру голышом.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida sem estar usando roupas.

description.english: Finish a Short game.
description.french: Terminez une partie courte.
description.schinese: 完成一局短时间游戏。
description.russian: Пройти игру в режиме «Быстро».
description.brazilian: Termine uma partida curta.

description.english: Finish a Medium game.
description.french: Terminez une partie moyenne.
description.schinese: 完成一局中等时间的游戏。
description.russian: Пройти игру в режиме «Средне».
description.brazilian: Termine uma partida média.

description.english: Finish a Long game.
description.french: Terminez une partie longue.
description.schinese: 完成一局长时间游戏。
description.russian: Пройти игру в режиме «Долго».
description.brazilian: Termine uma partida longa.

description.english: Finish a Marathon game.
description.french: Terminez une partie Marathon.
description.schinese: 完成一场马拉松比赛。
description.russian: Пройти игру в режиме «Марафон».
description.brazilian: Termine uma partida de "Maratona".

displayName.english: I'm Quite a Big Deal Online, 'ya Know
displayName.german: Online bin ich ziemlich wichtig, musst du wissen
displayName.french: Je suis assez connu en ligne, tu sais
displayName.brazilian: Eu sou bem famoso online, sabia?

description.english: Win an online multiplayer game.
description.french: Gagnez une partie en ligne.
description.schinese: 通关一局多人联网游戏。
description.russian: Выиграть в режиме «Долго», ни разу не поев.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida com vários jogadores online.

description.english: Win a long game without eating once.
description.german: Gewinne eine lange Partie ohne auch nur ein Mal zu essen.
description.french: Gagnez une partie longue sans manger une seule fois.
description.schinese: 在不吃饭的情况下通关一局长时间游戏。
description.russian: Выиграть в режиме «Долго», ни разу не поев.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida longa sem comer nenhuma vez.

displayName.french: J'avais pas faim, de toute façon....
displayName.brazilian: Eu nem estava com fome mesmo...

description.english: Forget to eat 10 times in a game.
description.german: Vergiss 10 mal in einem Spiel zu essen.
description.french: Oubliez de manger 10 fois de suite.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中忘记吃饭 10 次。
description.russian: За одну игру забыть поесть 10 раз.
description.brazilian: Esqueça de comer 10 vezes em uma partida.

description.english: Try the Bear Combo.
description.french: Essayez le combo ours.
description.schinese: 品尝小熊套餐。
description.russian: Попробовать «Медвежье меню».
description.brazilian: Experimente o Combo "Urso".

displayName.english: Cluckers is Life, Cluckers is Love
displayName.german: Cluckers ist Liebe, Cluckers ist Leben
displayName.french: Cluckers est la vie, Cluckers est l'amour
displayName.brazilian: Cluckers é vida, Cluckers é amor

description.english: Eat a Cluckers meal on every turn in a marathon game.
description.german: Iss eine Cluckers Mahlzeit in jeder Runde in einer Marathonpartie.
description.french: Mangez un menu Cluckers à chaque tour pendant une partie marathon.
description.schinese: 在马拉松比赛的每个回合吃一顿肯塔基。
description.russian: На каждом ходу в режиме «Марафон» есть в «Кококере».
description.brazilian: Coma uma refeição do Cluckers em cada rodada em uma partida de "Maratona".

description.english: Never go below 2 weeks worth of food in your fridge in a long game.
description.german: Habe in einem langen Spiel niemals weniger als einen 2 Wochen Vorrat an Essen in Deinem Kühlschrank.
description.french: N'ayez jamais moins de 2 semaines de nourriture dans votre frigo pendant une partie longue.
description.schinese: 在一局长时间游戏中，冰箱中的食物储备永远不低于 2 周。
description.russian: В режиме «Долго» всегда иметь более чем двухнедельный запас еды в холодильнике.
description.brazilian: Nunca fique com menos de 2 semanas de comida em sua geladeira em uma partida longa.

description.english: Click the Shit Drifters poster in your apartment.
description.german: Klicke auf das Shit Drifters Poster in Deiner Wohnung.
description.french: Cliquez sur le poster Shit Drifters dans votre appartement.
description.schinese: 点击公寓中的《铲屎官》海报。
description.russian: Провести в игре в общей сложности 168 часов — неделю реального времени.
description.brazilian: Clique no cartaz do Shit Drifters em seu apartamento.

description.english: Work 20 times consecutively without other actions.
description.french: Gagnez 20 fois de suite.
description.schinese: 连续工作 20 次。
description.russian: Сходить на работу 20 раз подряд.
description.brazilian: Trabalhe 20 vezes consecutivas.

description.english: Win a game without going to the gym or culture center.
description.german: Gewinne ein Spiel, ohne in das Fitnessstudio oder das Kulturzentrum zu gehen.
description.french: Gagnez une partie sans aller à la salle de sport ou au centre culturel.
description.schinese: 在不去健身房或文化中心的前提下通关一局游戏。
description.russian: Выиграть, не посетив ни спортзал, культурный центр.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida sem ir à academia ou ao Centro Cultural.

description.english: Eat only fries in one game.
description.german: Iss in einem Spiel nichts anderes als Fritten.
description.french: Ne mangez que des frites pendant une partie.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中支持薯条。
description.russian: Во время одной игры есть только картошку фри.
description.brazilian: Coma apenas fritas em uma partida.

description.english: Win a game as a CEO.
description.french: Gagnez une partie en étant PDG.
description.schinese: 用首席执行官通关一局游戏。
description.russian: Выиграть игру как генеральный директор.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida como CEO.

description.english: Win a game as a janitor
description.french: Gagnez une partie en tant que concierge
description.schinese: 以清洁工的身份通关一局游戏
description.russian: Выиграть игру как уборщик.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida como zelador

displayName.brazilian: Espera um pouco, o que é isso?

description.english: Invest in pork-butts.
description.french: Investissez dans les derrières de porc.
description.schinese: 投资上肩肉。
description.russian: Инвестировать в свиные лопатки.
description.brazilian: Invista em rabos de porco.

description.english: Invest 20 times in pork-butts.
description.french: Investissez dans les derrières de porc 20 fois.
description.schinese: 在上肩肉中投资 20 倍。
description.russian: Инвестировать в свиные лопатки 20 раз.
description.brazilian: Invista 20 vezes em rabos de porco.

description.english: Beat the CPU in all game modes.
description.german: Besiege die KI in allen Spielmodi.
description.french: Battez l'ordinateur dans tous les modes de jeu.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏模式中击败电脑对手。
description.russian: Победить компьютер во всех режимах игры.
description.brazilian: Derrote o CPU em todos os modos de jogo.

displayName.french: Pas le temps de se détendre

description.english: Play a total of 8 hours
description.french: Jouez pour un total de 8 heure
description.schinese: 游戏总时长达到 8 小时
description.russian: Провести в игре в общей сложности 8 часов
description.brazilian: Jogue por um total de 8 horas

description.english: Win a game with each character.
description.german: Gewinne eine Partie mit jedem Charakteren.
description.french: Gagnez une partie avec chaque personnage.
description.schinese: 用每个角色通关一局游戏。
description.russian: Выиграть игру всеми персонажами.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida com cada um dos personagens.

description.english: Relax while naked with max happiness.
description.german: Entspanne mit maximaler Glücklichkeit während Du nackt bist.
description.french: Détendez-vous tout nu avec le bonheur au max.
description.schinese: 赤身裸体放松并获得最高的幸福度。
description.russian: Отдохнуть голышом с максимальным счастьем.
description.brazilian: Relaxe sem roupa com o máximo de alegria.

displayName.english: I'd Like to Take a Loan to Pay My Debt, Thanks
displayName.german: Ich würde gerne einen Kredit aufnehmen, um meine Schulden zu abzubezahlen, danke
displayName.french: J'aimerais un prêt pour rembourser mes dettes, s'il vous plaît
displayName.russian: Хочу взять кредит на оплату долга, спасибо
displayName.brazilian: Eu gostaria de pegar um empréstimo para pagar minhas dívidas, por favor

description.english: Owe the bank over $1,000.
description.french: Devez plus de 1 000 $ à la banque.
description.schinese: 欠银行的钱超过 $1000。
description.russian: Задолжать банку более 1000 $.
description.brazilian: Fique devendo $1000 ao banco.

description.english: Move into Fancy Housing.
description.french: Emménagez dans le logement de luxe.
description.schinese: 搬入高级住宅。
description.russian: Переехать в модное жилье.
description.brazilian: Mude-se para uma Habitação de Luxo.

displayName.french: Emménagez dans le logement de luxe.

description.english: Live in the Fancy Housing for a total of 100 weeks.
description.german: Lebe für insgesamt 100 Wochen in der schicken Wohnung.
description.french: Vivez dans le logement de luxe pour un total de 100 semaines.
description.schinese: 在高级住宅的生活总时长达到 100 周。
description.russian: Снимать модное жилье в общей сложности 100 недель.
description.brazilian: Viva na Habitação de Luxo por um total de 100 semanas.

displayName.english: Crypto is the future! Hey, hey hey!
displayName.german: Krypto ist die Zukunft! Hey, hey, hey!
displayName.french: Les crytpos sont le futur ! Hé, hé, hé !
displayName.brazilian: As criptomoedas são o futuro! Ei, ei, ei!

description.english: Make a profit from Bytecoin investments
description.french: Faites des bénéfices en investissant dans les bytecoins
description.schinese: 在百特币投资中盈利。
description.russian: Получить прибыль от инвестиций в байткойн
description.brazilian: Obtenha lucro com investimentos em Bytecoin

displayName.french: Les bytectoins ne peuvent que monter
displayName.brazilian: Os Bytecoins vão aumentar sem parar

description.english: Make a total profit of $1000 from Bytecoins.
description.french: Gagnez 1000 $ grâce aux bytecoins.
description.schinese: 从百特币盈利总共 $1000。
description.russian: Заработать на байткойнах в общей сложности 1000 долларов.
description.brazilian: Obtenha um lucro total de $1000 com Bytecoins.

description.english: Make a total profit of $2000 from Stocks.
description.french: Gagnez 2000 $ grâce aux actions.
description.schinese: 从股票市场盈利总额达到 $2000。
description.russian: Заработать на акциях в общей сложности 2000 $.
description.brazilian: Obtenha um lucro total de $2000 com Ações.

description.english: Buy 5 Lottery Tickets in a game.
description.french: Achetez 5 tickets de loterie en une partie.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中购买 5 张材料。
description.russian: Купить за одну игру пять лотерейных билетов.
description.brazilian: Compre 5 Bilhetes de Loteria em uma partida.

displayName.french: Il va falloir faire quelque chose

description.english: Buy a Lottery Ticket 10 weeks in a row.
description.french: Achetez un ticket de loterie 10 semaines de suite.
description.schinese: 连续 10 周买彩票。
description.russian: Покупать лотерейный билет 10 недель подряд.
description.brazilian: Compre um Bilhete de Loteria por 10 semanas consecutivas.

displayName.english: It's Not an Addiction, I Can Stop if I Want
displayName.german: Es ist keine Sucht, ich kann aufhören, wann immer ich will
displayName.french: C'est pas une addiction, j’arrête quand je veux
displayName.russian: Это не зависимость — я могу остановиться, если захочу
displayName.brazilian: Não é vício, eu posso parar quando quiser

description.english: Buy a Lottery Ticket every week in a game.
description.german: Kaufe in einem Spiel in jeder Woche des Spiels einen Lotterieschein.
description.french: Achetez un ticket de loterie chaque semaine dans une partie.
description.schinese: 在游戏中每周购买一张彩票。
description.russian: Покупать лотерейный билет каждую неделю на протяжении одной игры.
description.brazilian: Compre um Bilhete da Loteria toda semana em uma partida.

description.english: Complete the University tree.
description.french: Terminez l'arbre universitaire.
description.schinese: 完成大学树。
description.russian: Пройти дерево учебы в университете.
description.brazilian: Complete a árvore da Universidade.

description.english: Spend half your turn studying for 2 weeks in a row.
description.german: Verbringe Deinen halben Zug für 2 Wochen am Stück mit Lernen.
description.french: Passez la moitié de votre tour à étudier 2 semaines de suite.
description.schinese: 连续 2 周把一半的回合用在学习上。
description.russian: Две недели подряд тратить половину хода на учебу.
description.brazilian: Passe metade de sua rodada estudando por 2 semanas consecutivas.

description.english: Have $0 in your wallet after enrolling in any university course.
description.german: Habe 0$ in Deiner Brieftasche nachdem Du dich in irgendeinem Universitätskurs angemeldet hast.
description.french: Finissez avec 0 $ dans votre portefeuille après vous être inscrit à une formation universitaire.
description.schinese: 在就读大学任意课程后兜里的钱还有 $0。
description.russian: Заплатить за любой университетский курс и остаться ни с чем.
description.brazilian: Fique com $0 em sua carteira depois desse matricular em qualquer curso da universidade.

description.english: Work out 10 weeks in a row.
description.french: Faites de l'exercice 10 semaines à la suite.
description.schinese: 连续锻炼 10 周。
description.russian: Тренироваться 10 недель подряд.
description.brazilian: Faça exercícios por 10 semanas consecutivas.

description.english: Do yoga 4 weeks in a row.
description.french: Faites du yoga 4 semaines à la suite.
description.schinese: 连续 4 周做瑜伽。
description.russian: Заниматься йогой четыре недели подряд.
description.brazilian: Faça ioga por 4 semanas consecutivas.

description.english: Eat fast food after working out.
description.german: Iss Fast Food, nachdem Du trainiert hast.
description.french: Mangez au fast food après avoir fait de l'exercice.
description.schinese: 锻炼后吃快餐。
description.russian: Заниматься йогой четыре недели подряд.
description.brazilian: Coma fast food depois de fazer exercícios.

description.english: Win a game without depositing money into the Bank
description.german: Gewinne eine Partie, ohne Geld auf die Bank zu legen.
description.french: Gagnez une partie sans déposer d'argent à la banque
description.schinese: 在不向银行存款的前提下赢下一局游戏
description.russian: Выиграть, не кладя деньги на счет в банк.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida sem depositar dinheiro algum no Banco

description.english: Store a total of $99.999 in the Bank.
description.french: Gagnez 2000 $ grâce aux actions.
description.schinese: 在银行中的存款总额达到 $99.999。
description.russian: Положить в банк в общей сложности 99 999 $.
description.brazilian: Guarde um total de $99,999 no Banco.

description.english: Visit the girl in the Culture center every week in a game.
description.german: Besuche das Mädchen im Kulturzentrum in jeder Woche einer Partie.
description.french: Rendez visite à la fille du Centre culturel toutes les semaines pendant une partie.
description.schinese: 在游戏中的每一周去拜访文化中心的女孩子。
description.russian: Заходить к девушке в культурном центре каждую неделю на протяжении одной игры.
description.brazilian: Visite a garota no Centro Cultural todas as semanas em uma partida.

displayName.german: Es ist das Geld meiner Eltern
displayName.brazilian: Foi com o dinheiro dos meus pais

description.english: Always pay your rent on time in a game.
description.german: Bezahle eine gesamte Partie lang Deine Miete pünktlich.
description.french: Payez votre loyer à temps pendant toute une partie.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中按时交租。
description.russian: Всегда оплачивать аренду вовремя на протяжении одной игры.
description.brazilian: Sempre pague seu aluguel na data certa em uma partida.

description.english: Go to space.
description.french: Allez dans l'espace.
description.schinese: 前往外太空。
description.russian: Отправиться в космос.
description.brazilian: Vá até o espaço.

description.english: Hike a mountain 20 times in a Marathon game.
description.german: Gehe in einer Marathonpartie 20 mal in den Bergen wandern.
description.french: Randonnez 20 fois en montagne lors d'une partie marathon.
description.schinese: 在马拉松比赛中爬山 20 次。
description.russian: В режиме «Марафон» подняться на гору 20 раз.
description.brazilian: Faça caminhadas em uma montanha 20 vezes em uma partida de "Maratona".

description.english: See a soccer match 6 times in a long game.
description.german: Schau dir in einem langen Spiel 6 Mal ein Fußballspiel an.
description.french: Allez voir un match de foot 6 fois pendant une partie longue.
description.schinese: 在一局长时间游戏中观看 6 次足球比赛。
description.russian: В режиме «Долго» шесть раз сходить на футбол.
description.brazilian: Assista um jogo de futebol 6 vezes em uma partida longa.

description.english: Go see a concert 2 weeks in a row.
description.german: Sieh dir zwei Wochen hintereinander ein Konzert an.
description.french: Allez voir un concert 2 semaines de suite.
description.schinese: 连续看 2 周的音乐会。
description.russian: Ходить на концерт две недели подряд.
description.brazilian: Assista um show por 2 semanas consecutivas.

displayName.french: Il faut bien commencer quelque part
displayName.brazilian: Você tem que começar em algum lugar

description.russian: Проработать уборщиком в общей сложности 101 неделю.

description.english: Buy a Fire Extinguisher and a Fire Alarm
description.german: Kaufe einen Feuerlöscher und einen Brandmelder
description.french: Achetez un extincteur et une alarme incendie
description.schinese: 购买一个灭火器和一个火灾报警器
description.russian: Купить огнетушитель и пожарную сигнализацию.
description.brazilian: Compre um Extintor de Incêndio e um Alarme contra Incêndio

displayName.french: Beaucoup de temps pour se détendre

description.english: Your stress level must be 1 or lower for a whole Marathon game.
description.german: Dein Stresslevel muss für ein ganzes Marathonspiel 1 oder weniger sein.
description.french: Votre niveau de stress doit être de 1 ou moins pendant toute une partie marathon.
description.schinese: 在整个马拉松比赛期间，你的压力等级不能高于 1。
description.russian: Всю игру в режиме «Марафон» уровень стресса равен единице или ниже.
description.brazilian: Seu nível de stress deve ser 1 ou menos durante toda uma partida de "Maratona".

description.english: Walk a total of 500 miles.
description.french: Marchez plus de 500 miles.
description.schinese: 步行距离超过 500 英里。
description.russian: Пройти более 500 миль.
description.brazilian: Caminhe mais de 500 milhas.

displayName.french: Jamais le temps de se détendre

description.english: Reach stress level 40.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de stress 40.
description.schinese: 达到压力等级 40。
description.russian: Дойти до уровня стресса в 40 баллов.
description.brazilian: Atinja o nível de stress 40.

description.english: Spend a total of 50 weeks naked.
description.french: Passez un total de 50 semaines tout nu.
description.schinese: 保持躶体 50 周。
description.russian: Провести в общей сложности 50 недель голышом.
description.brazilian: Passe um total de 50 semanas sem roupas.

displayName.english: I Just Like to Look Nice
displayName.german: Ich mag es nur, gut auszusehen
displayName.brazilian: Eu só gosto de ficar elegante

description.english: Buy a suit without having any education.
description.german: Kaufe einen Anzug ohne jedwede Bildung.
description.french: Achetez un costume sans avoir d'instruction.
description.schinese: 不接受教育就去购买服装。
description.russian: Купить костюм, не имея образования.
description.brazilian: Compre um terno sem ter estudado nada.

description.english: In a single game buy all the items possible for your apartment.
description.german: Kaufe in einem einzigen Spiel alle möglichen Gegenstände für Deine Wohnung.
description.french: Achetez tous les objets possibles pour votre appartement en une seule partie.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中，为公寓购买所有可能的物品。
description.russian: За одну игру скупить все возможные предметы для квартиры.
description.brazilian: Em uma única partida, compre todos os itens possíveis para seu apartamento.

description.english: Buy everything for your kitchen and fully stock your fridge.
description.german: Kaufe alles für Deine Küche und stocke Deinen Kühlschrank vollständig auf.
description.french: Achetez tout pour votre cuisine et remplissez votre frigo.
description.schinese: 购买所有厨房用具并把冰箱塞满。
description.russian: Купить всё для кухни и полностью забить холодильник.
description.brazilian: Compre tudo para sua cozinha e encha sua geladeira.

description.english: Find all the developers in the game.
description.french: Trouvez tous les développeurs dans le jeu.
description.schinese: 在游戏中找到所有的开发人员。
description.russian: Найти в игре всех разработчиков.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os desenvolvedores no jogo.

displayName.english: Why? Why Did You Do This?
displayName.german: Warum? Warum würdest Du das tun?
displayName.schinese: 搞什么？为什么要这么做？
displayName.brazilian: Por quê? Por que você fez isso?

description.english: Make the mysterious stranger lose his head.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass der mysteriöse Fremde seinen Kopf verliert.
description.french: Faites perdre la tête à l'étranger mystérieux.
description.schinese: 让神秘陌生人惊慌失措。
description.russian: Заставить таинственного незнакомца потерять голову.
description.brazilian: Faça o forasteiro misterioso perder a cabeça.
